name: C-Dogs SDL
body:
##### C-Dogs is an arcade shoot-em-up, for up to two local players. Co-op and 1v1 "dogfights" are available. Customize your player, choose from up to 11 weapons, and try the dozens of user-created campaigns.

### [**Visit the wiki**](https://github.com/cxong/cdogs-sdl/wiki) for more information.

![](https://raw.github.com/cxong/cdogs-sdl/master/doc/images/game_screen.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
